I

isPalindrome(String) - Static method in class lab07.Palindrome
Takes a string and checks if the first and last letters are equal if yes then the substring without the first and last letters is passed through isPalindrome as parameter sString

L

lab07 - package lab07
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class lab07.Palindrome
Reads in a scanner and places the string into a variable line, calls isPalindrome with line as the parameter of te normalise method.

N

normalise(String) - Static method in class lab07.Palindrome
If a character is not in the alphabet it is not added to the string that will be returned

P

This Class determines if a string is a Palindrome
